title: Parametric Circles and Lines - average temperature

content.question: For a certain city, the average daily temperature, in degrees Fahrenheit, for each day for one month—day <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> through day <math alttext="31"><mn>31</mn></math>—is modeled by the parametric function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> defined by <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>. For the interval <math alttext="0 less or equal than t less or equal than 1"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses 1 plus 30 t comma 40 plus 15 t close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>. Another parametric function <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is equivalent to <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> and uses a different parameter <math alttext="d"><mi>d</mi></math>, where <math alttext="1 less or equal than d less or equal than 31"><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>d</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>31</mn></math>. Which of the following could define <math alttext="k open parentheses d close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses d close parentheses comma y open parentheses d close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>d</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>d</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>d</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses d comma 40 plus 15 over 30 open parentheses d minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses d comma 40 plus 15 over 31 open parentheses d minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>31</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses 1 plus 30 over 31 d comma 40 plus 15 over 31 d close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>30</mn><mn>31</mn></mfrac><mi>d</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>31</mn></mfrac><mi>d</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses 1 plus fraction numerator open parentheses d minus 1 close parentheses over denominator 31 end fraction comma 40 plus 15 over 30 open parentheses d minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>31</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses d comma 40 plus 15 over 30 open parentheses d minus 1 close parentheses close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>40</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>15</mn><mn>30</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
